origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_market_data', 'description': 'Get historical market data for a specified market and period, including stock and bond trading volumes', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'market', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the market to get data for'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the time period for the data'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the type of data to get, e.g., stock, bond'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'data', 'description': 'the historical market data'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解人民币市场的金融市场情况。首先，获取过去一年中国的股票市场和债券市场的交易量数据。然后，分析这些数据，找出交易量变化较大的月份。接着，获取这些月份的主要经济新闻，看看是否有相关事件影响金融市场。最后，基于这些分析，预测未来三个月中国的金融市场走势。
获取过去一年中国的股票市场和债券市场的交易量数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
PolygonFinance.get_market_data
当前工具的参数'market'的值是什么?
China
当前工具的参数'period'的值是什么?
1 year
当前工具的参数'type'的值是什么?
stock, bond
